about_the_game:
Color Wheels is the solution to your color selection dilemma. This app, based on color wheel theory, helps you create harmonious color combinations quickly and easily. A color wheel is a tool used in color theory to visualize the relationships between colors.

Choose a base color and watch as the app suggests elegant combinations, creating visually pleasing and balanced compositions based on your chosen color harmonies and color wheel type.

The app offers a variety of color wheels to choose from, ranging from Johannes Itten's gradient circle to Wilhelm Friedrich Oswald's circle, as well as circles with hue shifts, color temperature shifts, and color interpretations for print.


You can modify the color harmony and control the hue shift for each sample, seeing the changes directly on the wheel and in the color swatch set. This can significantly speed up the decision-making process for the color combination you'll use in your project.


If your profession or hobby involves graphic design, web design, photography, videography, architectural visualization, or game development, this app is for you. Whether you're editing photos, painting, color grading videos, creating motion graphics, designing YouTube thumbnails, concept art, or 3D models for film and games, this app will help you find the perfect color solution with elegance and taste.

name: Color Wheels

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Color Wheels is an application based on the color wheel technique. It allows you to quickly and easily create harmonious color combinations. Choose the desired type of color wheel and harmony, control the harmony modifier and tones, and get pleasing color combinations for your projects.
